CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: （多少）岁；老的；古老的；过去的；原来的；原先的；年纪大的；不年轻的；存在时间长的；使用时间长的；相识时间长的；存在时间长的
旧事物；…岁的人；年长者；老人；长者；老年人；前辈；老辈；（尊称）老者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指长期以来一直存在着的事物，与times连用指古代，与days连用时指从前或旧社会。
指很久以前发生或存在的事物。用于描述历史时，指远古时代。
指已经很古老或颇有古风的事物，一般都具有较高价值。

word_group.brief_definition: 俗话说；正如老话所说；常言道
年老的司机(区分"老司机")

bilingual.target: 这是一堵非常古老的墙。

bilingual.source: Is he funny or young or old?
bilingual.target: 他是有趣的、年轻的还是老的？

bilingual.source: You have to read this old story.
bilingual.target: 你必须读这个古老的故事。

bilingual.source: This old clock is a hundred years old.
bilingual.target: 这个古老的时钟已经有百年历史了。

bilingual.source: This old building is a hundred years old.
bilingual.target: 这座古老的楼房有百年历史。

bilingual.source: This old gatehouse is several hundred years old.
bilingual.target: 这个古老的门房已经有几百年的历史了。
我们参观了一个古老的庄园。
他们住在一栋古老的房子里。

list.abstract: old，英文单词，形容词、名词，作形容词时意为“陈旧的，古老的；年老的”，作名词时意为“古时，人名；(英)奥尔德”。

yingyinNormal.en: We haven't yet, but we will when she's old.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们还没有，但等她老的不能动时我们会的。

yingyinNormal.en: What do we have here? An old comic. That was my favorite comic. A tin toy. My favorite toy. Music. My favorite record. And a very old carrot. That's mine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是一本旧的漫画书。那个是我最喜欢的漫画书！缎子的玩具。那是我最喜欢的玩具。一张唱片。是我最喜欢的唱片。还有一根很老很老的胡萝卜。这是我的。

yingyinNormal.en: I just come here to look at the fish. I knew this would happen one day. It's like that old story.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是来这里看看鱼。我知道总有一天会这样，就像那个古老的故事。

yingyinNormal.en: Predictably, your ex ran the old, grill-the-best-friend play, tried to find out where your head was at.
yingyinNormal.zh: 未卜先知，你前女友上演了一场古老的"盘问好朋友"的戏码，试图想知道你脑子究竟在想什么。

yingyinNormal.en: Well chosen, George. I'll paint the old cherry tree. What's that? It's an easel, Peppa. It hold my canvas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个是个不错的选择，那我就来画这颗老的樱桃树。那是什么呀？这是一个画架呀佩奇，它能固定我的画布。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, we have terms for westerners, the most common of which are Gwailo in Cantonese, which means the old devil.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们有对西方人的称呼最常见的是广东话，鬼佬，意思就是很老的鬼。

yingyinNormal.en: Beijing has transformed enormously over the last decade to meet demand. And some of its old ways have changed, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 过去10年北京已经发生了巨大的变化，来满足人民的需求。一些老的道路也被改变了。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, so, Theresa was using the old bicameral control system to reprogram the woodcutter, but she's not the only one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，特蕾莎利用老的二分制控制系统改编了伐木工体内的程序，但她不是唯一一个这么做的人。

yingyinNormal.en: And I was in the shower along time. And as I was in the shower the words of an old hymn came to me, you may not know it. It's "By and by, when the morning comes".
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我淋浴的时候，一首古老的赞美诗闪过脑海，你们可能没听过这个“耐心等待，曙光终将到来。”

yingyinNormal.en: I guess I prefer to make people the old fashioned way. Well. Perhaps someday you could give me a history lesson in the archaic ways of our ancestors. For academic purposes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还是更倾向于用传统的方式造人。或许哪天你可以给我上堂历史课说说我们祖先最传统古老的方式。纯粹作学术讨论。

yingyinNormal.en: Those are all really old.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，这些片子很旧啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Look how old you've become.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瞧瞧你都老成什么样了。

yingyinNormal.en: Scary old lady. Farkle. Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 吓人的老太太。法尔科，哦。

yingyinNormal.en: What if Old Nick unwraps me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 老尼克把我翻出来怎么办？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh yeah? Did he pull the old…
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是不是…

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, that must get old quick.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是，他们肯定老得很快。

yingyinNormal.en: Let us tell an old story a new.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我们重新讲述一个老故事。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you? Thank you, old sport.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？谢谢，老伙计。

yingyinNormal.en: What's wrong with rusty old cars?
yingyinNormal.zh: 老到生锈的车怎么了？

yingyinNormal.en: Never gets old. No, no, to a girl.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个笑话永远都好笑，不，是和一个女孩。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: having lived or existed for many years

examination_example.sentence: It's not as hard for them to transform their thought processes as it is for <highlight>older</highlight> students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在转变思维程序方面，他们（小孩）不像年龄较大的学生一样困难。

examination_example.sentence: I want to share these <highlight>old</highlight> truths I've learned along the way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想分享这些我一路上学到的古老真理。

examination_example.sentence: An <highlight>old</highlight> saying has it that half of all advertising budgets are wasted — the trouble is, no one knows which half.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有句老话说，所有广告预算的一半都被浪费了——问题是，没人知道是哪一半。

sense_info_list.en: belonging only or chiefly to the past; former or previous

examination_example.sentence: California has asked the justices to refrain from a sweeping ruling, particularly one that upsets the <highlight>old</highlight> assumption.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加州要求大法官不要做出大范围的裁决，尤其是推翻旧假设的裁决。

examination_example.sentence: We suddenly can't remember where we put the keys just a moment ago, or the name of an <highlight>old</highlight> band.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们突然想不起刚才我们把钥匙放在哪里了，或者记不起一个老乐队的名字。

examination_example.sentence: There are some legitimate concerns about how science prizes — both new and <highlight>old</highlight> — are distributed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于科学奖项——无论是新设的还是既有的——是如何分配的，存在一些合理的担忧。

examination_example.sentence: When Shakespeare was twelve years <highlight>old</highlight> the first public playhouse was built in London.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莎士比亚十二岁时，伦敦建造了第一座公共剧场。

examination_example.sentence: Schneider, a 27-year-<highlight>old</highlight> auto technician from the Chicago suburbs, says he struggled to find a job after graduating from college.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 来自芝加哥郊区的27岁汽车技术员Schneider说，他大学毕业后很难找到工作。

examination_example.sentence: A couple of Christmases ago, my youngest stepdaughter, who was nine years <highlight>old</highlight> at the time, got a Superman T-shirt for Christmas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几个圣诞节前，我最小的继女（当时她只有九岁）得到了一件超人T恤作为圣诞礼物。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>old</highlight> made more life achievements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老年人取得了更多的生活成就。

examination_example.sentence: Young and <highlight>old</highlight> converge on one key point.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 年轻人和老年人在关键的一点上达成一致。

examination_example.sentence: While young and <highlight>old</highlight> mostly agree on what constitutes the finish line of a fulfilling life, they offer strikingly different paths for reaching it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然年轻一辈和老一辈对什么是成功人生的终点大体达成一致，但他们为实现这一目标提供了截然不同的路径。

sense_info_list.en: having the characteristics or showing the signs of age

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Old</highlight> objects continue to deteriorate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 旧物品的情况继续恶化。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Old</highlight> telescopes will be removed at the end of their lifetimes and their sites returned to a natural state.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 旧望远镜在达到使用年限时将会被拆除，其原址也将被恢复到自然状态。

examination_example.sentence: What was once exciting and new becomes <highlight>old</highlight>-hat; regret creeps in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 曾经令人兴奋的新事物变成了过时之物，后悔随之而来。

word_usage.usage: old作形容词，前面加the泛指“老年人”，其谓语动词通常用复数形式，如：The old feel the cold more than the young. 老年人比年轻人怕冷。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: having lived for a long time; no longer young

examination_example.sentence: Talk to anyone who's a generation not too <highlight>older</highlight> and they would most likely comment that children are more spoiled these days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和任何一个年纪不大的人交谈，他们很可能会说现在的孩子更被宠坏了。

examination_example.sentence: You may have a good chance of living to a ripe <highlight>old</highlight> age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能有很大的机会活到高龄。

examination_example.sentence: Police and fire services will spend the next 48 hours assessing the "security and safety" of the 850-year-<highlight>old</highlight> structure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 警察和消防部门将在接下来的48小时内评估这座有850年历史的建筑的“安保和安全”。

sense_info_list.en: belonging only or chiefly to the past; former or previous

examination_example.sentence: Destroying <highlight>old</highlight> stock is a practice not just of luxury brands but of less prestigious fashion brands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 销毁旧库存不仅是奢侈品牌的做法，也是不太知名的时尚品牌的做法。

examination_example.sentence: As automation spreads further, the question is how these remote communities will survive when the <highlight>old</highlight> jobs are eliminated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着自动化的进一步普及，问题是当旧的工作岗位被淘汰时，这些偏远的社区将如何生存。

examination_example.sentence: This preoccupation inevitably leads to an <highlight>old</highlight> debate: whether nature or nurture moulds us more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种专注不可避免地引发了一场长久存在的辩论:是先天还是后天更能塑造我们。

sense_info_list.en: dating from far back; long-established or known

examination_example.sentence: In the film, Dean will be recreated on screen with CGI based on <highlight>old</highlight> footage (影片镜头) and photographs, with another actor voicing him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这部电影中，迪恩将会根据以前的镜头和照片，用CGI技术在屏幕上重现，并由另一位演员为他配音。

examination_example.sentence: One famous experiment in the 1960s involved 3- to 6-year-<highlight>old</highlight> children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1960年代的一项著名实验涉及三至六岁的儿童。

sense_info_list.en: having the characteristics or showing the signs of age

word_usage.usage: the old可泛指“老年人”，这时谓语动词应该用复数形式，
表示“资格老，地位高”，不能用older，而要用elder。

在家庭成员中的同一辈中“长幼”关系应该用elder和eldest，而不用older和oldest。
示例：最大的女儿承包了所有的活。
误 The oldest daughter does all the housework.
正 The eldest daughter does all the housework.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指很久以前发生或存在的事物。用于描述历史时, 指远古时代。
指已经很古老或颇有古风的家具、珠宝等, 一般都具有较高价值。
指长期以来一直存在着的事物, 常用搭配：old times 指古代; old days 指从前或旧社会。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: having lived for a long time; no longer young

examination_example.sentence: However, merely having contact with children does not guarantee happiness in <highlight>old</highlight> age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，仅仅与孩子联系并不能保证晚年的幸福。

examination_example.sentence: It further widens the gap between the <highlight>old</highlight> and the young.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它进一步拉大了老年人和年轻人之间的差距。

examination_example.sentence: So say goodnight sooner and it may help you stay active and vital to a ripe <highlight>old</highlight> age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以，早点说晚安，它可能会帮助你保持活力，这对岁数大的人来说至关重要。

sense_info_list.en: belonging only or chiefly to the past; former or previous

examination_example.sentence: Rural kids used to walk a long way to school in the <highlight>old</highlight> days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以前，农村孩子上学要走很长一段路。

examination_example.sentence: Moreover, most adult children provide as much care and support to their aging parents as was the case in the "good <highlight>old</highlight> days".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，大多数成年子女对年迈父母的关心和支持丝毫不亚于“美好旧时光”。

examination_example.sentence: What does the author say about Italians of the <highlight>old</highlight> days?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者对以前的意大利人有什么看法？

sense_info_list.en: dating from far back; long-established or known

examination_example.sentence: Recently, the restaurant manager Ryan Krivoy decided to replace the wooden deck and he found an <highlight>old</highlight> gold coin while replacing the deck.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近，餐厅经理Ryan Krivoy决定更换木制甲板，他在更换甲板时发现了一枚旧金币。

examination_example.sentence: Under the <highlight>old</highlight> system in America, a mother was supposed to stay home and take care of her children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国古老的制度下，母亲应该呆在家里照顾孩子。

examination_example.sentence: That‘s why you see it used in all of the <highlight>older</highlight> airlines like British Airways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是为什么你会看到它被用于所有的老牌航空公司，比如英国航空公司。

sense_info_list.en: having the characteristics or showing the signs of age

examination_example.sentence: Even the <highlight>old</highlight> metal lunch boxes have regained popularity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 甚至旧的金属饭盒也重新流行起来。

examination_example.sentence: I managed to sell a lot of my <highlight>old</highlight> furniture and put that extra money towards the new material.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我设法卖掉了许多旧家具，把多余的钱用在新材料上。

examination_example.sentence: Kids would beg for a new lunch box every year, even if their <highlight>old</highlight> lunch box was perfectly usable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孩子们每年都会乞求换一个新的饭盒，即使他们的旧饭盒完全可以使用。

word_usage.usage: the old可泛指“老年人”，这时谓语动词应该用复数形式，
表示“资格老，地位高”，不能用older，而要用elder。

在家庭成员中的同一辈中“长幼”关系应该用elder和eldest，而不用older和oldest。
示例：最大的女儿承包了所有的活。
误 The oldest daughter does all the housework.
正 The eldest daughter does all the housework.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指很久以前发生或存在的事物。用于描述历史时，指远古时代。
指已经很古老或颇有古风的家具、珠宝等，一般都具有较高价值。
指长期以来一直存在着的事物，常用搭配：old times 指古代; old days 指从前或旧社会。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: having lived for a long time; no longer young

examination_example.sentence: Moreover, the <highlight>older</highlight> you are, the more likely you will come to a resolution after an argument.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，年龄越大，越有可能在争吵后达成解决方案。

examination_example.sentence: Research shows that giving up driving is one of the key reasons for a fall in health and well-being among <highlight>older</highlight> people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究表明，放弃驾驶是老年人健康和幸福感下降的关键原因之一。

examination_example.sentence: The Intelligent Transport team have turned an electric car into a mobile laboratory in order to understand the challenges faced by <highlight>older</highlight> drivers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 智能交通运输团队为了了解老年司机所面临的挑战，把一辆电动车变成了移动实验室。

sense_info_list.en: belonging only or chiefly to the past; former or previous

examination_example.sentence: When you sleep, your brain sorts through everything that happened during the day, trying to link new experiences to <highlight>old</highlight> memories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你睡觉时，你的大脑会整理白天发生的一切，试图将新的经历与旧的记忆联系起来。

examination_example.sentence: Seconds later, our lizard emerged from its tank with its <highlight>old</highlight> skin flowing behind it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几秒后，蜥蜴从水箱里钻了出来，蜕下的皮在身后漂着。

examination_example.sentence: Its <highlight>old</highlight> skin came off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的旧皮脱落了。

sense_info_list.en: having the characteristics or showing the signs of age

examination_example.sentence: Dirty shorts and <highlight>old</highlight> shoes gave him the appearance of a real beggar and his convincing dialect soon won him the trust of the beggars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 肮脏的短裤和旧鞋子让他看起来像一个真正的乞丐，他令人信服的方言很快赢得了乞丐的信任。

examination_example.sentence: They think tradition means <highlight>old</highlight> things from the past.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们认为传统意味着过去的旧事物。

examination_example.sentence: The film classic The Last Picture Show was the last movie shown in the <highlight>old</highlight> theater.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经典电影《最后一场电影秀》是这个老电影院放映的最后一部电影。

examination_example.sentence: Paulo Magalhaes, a 34-year-<highlight>old</highlight> Portuguese computer engineer, loves to open his mailbox and find a brightly colored picture of Rome's Colosseum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 34岁的葡萄牙电脑工程师Paulo Magalhaes喜欢打开他的邮箱，然后发现一张色彩鲜艳的罗马斗兽场照片。

examination_example.sentence: You must be at least 20 years <highlight>old</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你肯定至少有20岁。

examination_example.sentence: The 60-year-<highlight>old</highlight> is not an actor, but a policeman.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位60岁的老人不是演员，而是警察。

sense_info_list.en: dating from far back; long-established or known

examination_example.sentence: Of the following stadiums, which is the <highlight>oldest</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下列体育馆中，哪个最古老？

examination_example.sentence: Oxford: Includes a guided tour of England's <highlight>oldest</highlight> university city and colleges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 牛津：包括导游参观英国最古老的大学城市和学院。

word_usage.usage:
①在brother、sister、son、daughter、 grandson、granddaughter 等词前常用elder 和eldest：
His elder brother was in a car accident last week.
上周他哥哥出了车祸。
表示两个人中较年长的一个时，用elder：the elder of the two两个人中年长的一个
②the old老年人：部分形容词前加定冠词the，表示一类人或一类物

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指很久以前发生或存在的事物。用于描述历史时，指远古时代。
指已经很古老或颇有古风的家具、珠宝等，一般都具有较高价值。
指长期以来一直存在着的事物，常用搭配：old times 指古代；old days 指从前或旧社会。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 俗话说；正如老话所说；常言道

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>old</highlight> lady wanted to know where the stations waiting room was.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老太太想知道车站的候车室在哪里。

examination_example.sentence: It is an <highlight>old</highlight> city with many <highlight>old</highlight> museums.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个有许多老博物馆的古城。

examination_example.sentence: Even children and <highlight>old</highlight> people can drive them to school and parks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 甚至小孩和老人都可以开车送他们去学校和公园。

examination_example.sentence: Now I am a 19-year-<highlight>old</highlight> college student.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在我是一名19岁的大学生。

examination_example.sentence: This 5-year-<highlight>old</highlight> boy has such a good sense of direction that he never gets lost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个5岁的男孩方向感很好，从来不会迷路。

examination_example.sentence: If you were ninety years <highlight>old</highlight>, what would you plan to do?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你已经90岁了，你打算做些什么?

examination_example.sentence: In the <highlight>old</highlight> days before computers, to get information, people read books and newspapers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在电脑出现之前，人们通过阅读书籍和报纸来获取信息。

examination_example.sentence: The windows and doors come from <highlight>old</highlight> buildings around her town that were pulled down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 窗户和门来自她所在小镇周围被拆除的旧建筑。

examination_example.sentence: Although he has not played with his <highlight>old</highlight> toys for a long time, he still wanted to keep them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然已经很长时间没玩旧玩具了，但他仍然想留着它们。

word_usage.usage: the old可泛指“老年人”，这时谓语动词应该用复数形式，
表示“资格老，地位高”，不能用older，而要用elder。

在家庭成员中的同一辈中“长幼”关系应该用elder和eldest，而不用older和oldest。
示例：最大的女儿承包了所有的活。
误 The oldest daughter does all the housework.
正 The eldest daughter does all the housework.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指很久以前发生或存在的事物。用于描述历史时，指远古时代。
指长期以来一直存在着的事物，与times连用指旧时光，与days连用时指从前或旧社会。
